duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the execution of the client experience strategy and identify opportunities for improvement in boutique to ensure exceptional service.
Create exceptional client experiences by delivering a warm welcome, personalized product curation, and attention throughout the client visit.
Support the needs of the hybrid environment by assisting with all duties at the front podium, appointment support, and sales finalization activities.
Optimize the boutique environment by managing traffic, maintaining visual standards, and inventory control processes.
Develop fundamental brand knowledge to convey Cartier heritage and values while remaining compliant with security and operational procedures.
Contribute to a positive and collaborative boutique environment by leveraging personal and team savoir-faire.
